overview: This animal can darken or lighten its body color, and is not easily visible to the human eye because of its adeptness at camouflaging its form. When the male reaches the mating season, it decorates the surrounding area with beautifully shining jewels and stones of various color to lure the female, whom is attracted to shining light, and makes secretive and hallucinatory the place in which the mating will take place.
title: The Mating Season - 2. A Weird Animal
